name: Giant Slayer
description: Passive:Gain 15% additional  Damage Amp against Tanks.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: Passive:Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Passive:Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

name: Edge of Night
description: Passive:At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable, shed negative effects, and heal 30% missing health.

name: Bloodthirster
description: Passive:Once per combat at 40% health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

name: Sterak's Gage
description: Passive:At 60% Health, gain a Shield equal to 50% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over 4 seconds.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Passive:Abilities can  critically strike.If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10%  Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Noxus Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Noxus trait.

name: Slayer Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Slayer trait.Upon dropping below 25% max Health, Gain 20 Mana and a 30% max Health Shield.

name: Void Staff
description: Passive:Damage from attacks and Abilities 30%  Shred the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Passive:Combat start: Gain 20%  Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

name: Blue Buff
description: Passive:Gain 10% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.

name: Protector's Vow
description: Passive:Combat Start: Gain 20 Mana.

name: Adaptive Helm
description: Passive:Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:Tanks and Fighters: Gain 45 Armor and Magic Resistance.Other Roles: Gain 10%  Attack Damage and  Ability Power.

name: Spirit Visage
description: Passive:Restore 2.5% of missing Health each second

name: Hand of Justice
description: Passive:Gain 2 effects:15% Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power.12%  Omnivamp.

name: Bilgewater Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Bilgewater trait.

name: Invoker Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Invoker trait.On cast, gain Ability Power equal to 10% of Mana spent.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Passive:Gain 7% stacking Attack Speed every second.

name: Crownguard
description: Passive:Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.When the shield expires, gain 25% Ability Power.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Passive:30%  Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 150% of the Mana spent.Shred: Reduce Magic Resist.

name: Morellonomicon
description: Passive:Attacks and Abilities deal 1%  Burn and 33%  Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second.Wound: Reduces healing received.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Passive:Abilities can  critically strike.If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10%  Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Ionia Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Ionia trait.

name: Arcanist Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Arcanist trait.On kill, refund 20% of the holder's max Mana.

name: Red Buff
description: Passive:Attacks and Abilities 1%  Burn and 33%  Wound enemies for 5 seconds.Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second.Wound: Reduces healing received.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: Passive:Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.At full stacks, gain 10%  Damage Amp and gain immunity to crowd control.

name: Kraken's Fury
description: Passive:Attacks grant 3.5% stacking Attack Damage, up to 15 attacks. After 15 attacks, gain 15% Attack Speed.

name: Nashor's Tooth
description: Passive:Attacks grant 2 bonus Mana, increased to 4 if they  critically strike.

name: Last Whisper
description: Passive:Damage from attacks and Abilities damage 30%  Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Void Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Void trait.

name: Quickstriker Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Quickstriker trait.On takedown, dash to the nearest target and heal for 10% maximum Health.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Passive:Gain 9% max health.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Passive:Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Passive:Gain 8% max health.

name: Steadfast Heart
description: Passive:Gain 10%  Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 18%  Durability.

name: Demacia Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Demacia trait.

name: Defender Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Defender trait.Combat Start: Gain 35% more Armor OR Magic Resist from all sources, depending on whichever is higher.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Passive:Gain 9% max health.

name: Evenshroud
description: Passive:30%  Sunder enemies with 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.Sunder: Reduce Armor.

name: Quicksilver
description: Passive:Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds.

name: Yordle Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Yordle trait.

name: Juggernaut Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Juggernaut trait and 10% of other Juggernaut's max Health when they die.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Passive:Gain 18% max health.

name: Striker's Flail
description: Passive: Critical Strikes grant 5%  Damage Amp for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Freljord Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Freljord trait.

name: Bruiser Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Bruiser trait.Every second, deal 2% of the holder's max Health as magic damage in a 1-hex radius.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: Passive:Each round: Equip 2 random items.

name: Zaun Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Zaun trait.

name: Vanquisher Emblem
description: Passive:The holder gains the  Vanquisher trait and a 3% chance to drop  1 on critical strikes.

name: Tactician's Crown
description: Passive:Your team gains +1 maximum team size.10% chance to drop  1 when you win combat.

name: Tactician's Cape
description: Passive:Your team gains +1 maximum team size.10% chance to drop  1 after 10 seconds of combat.

name: Tactician's Shield
description: Passive:Your team gains +1 maximum team size.10% chance to drop  1 when the holder dies.
